databases
Class CourseBase.DatabaseReader

java.lang.Object
  databases.CourseBase.DatabaseReader
Enclosing class:
CourseBase
public class CourseBase.DatabaseReader
extends java.lang.Object

Reads and parses all the database files. This is used by CourseBase to load all the courses.

Author:
Niels Thykier

Field Summary
private  java.io.BufferedReader[] database
          Files objects, the databases loaded into memory.

CourseBase.DatabaseReader()
          Opens the three database files for reading.

Field Detail

database

private java.io.BufferedReader[] database
Files objects, the databases loaded into memory.

Constructor Detail

CourseBase.DatabaseReader

public CourseBase.DatabaseReader()
                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                 FilePermissionException
Opens the three database files for reading.

Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - If one of the database files are missing.
FilePermissionException - if permissions is missing to read the file
Method Detail

openFile

private java.io.BufferedReader openFile(java.lang.String filename)
                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                        FilePermissionException
This is called by the constructor to open the database files.

Parameters:
filename - The name of the file to open.
Returns:
A BufferedReader to read the file.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file is not found.
FilePermissionException - if permissions is missing to read the file

loadAllCourses

public java.util.ArrayList<Course> loadAllCourses()
This loads all courses into memory from the files. This method will also update some statisical data in CourseBase

Returns:
An ArrayList containing all the valid courses that could be loaded.
